card.name: Adorable Kitten
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. You gain life equal to the result.

card.name: AWOL
card.property: Exile target attacking creature. Then remove it from the game. Then put it into the absolutely-removed-from-the-freaking-game-forever zone.

card.name: Emcee
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may stand up and say in a deep, booming voice, "Presenting . . . " and that creature's name. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ogre appealed the match loss and got it downgraded to a warning.

card.name: Flavor Judge
card.property: {T}: Choose target spell or ability that targets a permanent you control. Then ask a person outside the game if the story of what will happen makes sense. If they say no, sacrifice Flavor Judge and counter that spell or ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "...and now they're trying to make a brick wall on my property fight a dinosaur to the death."

card.name: Frankie Peanuts
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may ask target player a yes-or-no question. If you do, that player answers the question truthfully and abides by that answer if able until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't cross him or you'll end up sleeping with the merfolk.

card.name: GO TO JAIL
card.property: When GO TO JAIL enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until GO TO JAIL leaves the battlefield. At the beginning of the upkeep of the exiled card's owner, that player rolls two six-sided dice. If they roll doubles, sacrifice GO TO JAIL.

card.name: Humming-
card.property: Flying Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, Augment {3}{W} ({3}{W}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Knight of the Hokey Pokey
card.property: First strike {1}{W}, Do the Hokey Pokey: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to Knight of the Hokey Pokey this turn. (To do the Hokey Pokey, put your right foot in. Put your right foot out. Put your right foot in. Shake it all about. Repeat this process for your left foot, right arm, left arm, and whole self.)

card.name: Look at Me, I'm R&D
card.property: As Look at Me, I'm R"D enters the battlefield, choose a number and a second number one higher or one lower than the first number. All instances of the first chosen number in the full text of each permanent, spell, and card in any zone are changed to the second chosen number.

card.name: Look at Me, I'm the DCI
card.property: Ban a card other than a basic land card for the rest of the match. (All cards with that name in any zone or sideboard are removed from the match.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few understand the DCI's rigorous decision-making process.

card.name: Old Guard
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature without reminder text. (Reminder text is still any italicized text in parentheses that explains rules you already know.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You say you're capable of flying. You got any proof of that?"

card.name: Ordinary Pony
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Horse creature you control that wasn't put onto the battlefield with this ability this turn, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Staying Power
card.property: "Until end of turn" and "this turn" effects don't end.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mongo's fleas no longer bothered him. But the family of goblins that had moved in behind his left ear was starting to get really irritating.

card.name: Strutting Turkey
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, exile target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard. If it has augment, combine it with a host you control. Otherwise, put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl
card.property: Knightlifelink (Damage dealt by Knights you control also causes you to gain that much life.) {W}: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate this ability only from sunrise to sunset. {B}: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only from sunset to sunrise.

card.name: Alexander Clamilton
card.property: Whenever you cast a wordy spell, scry 2. (A spell is wordy if it has four or more lines of rules text.) {1}{R}, {T}: Choose target creature you don't control. Reveal the top card of your library. Alexander Clamilton gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of lines of rules text on the revealed card. Alexander Clamilton fights that creature.

card.name: Avatar of Me
card.property: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each ten years you've been alive. Avatar of Me's power is equal to your height in feet and its toughness is equal to your American shoe size. Round to the nearest ½. Avatar of Me is the color of your eyes.

card.name: B.O.B. (Bevy of Beebles)
card.property: As B.O.B. (Bevy of Beebles) enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 blue Beeble creature tokens. The number of loyalty counters on B.O.B. is equal to the number of Beebles you control. (Create or sacrifice Beebles whenever B.O.B. gains or loses loyalty.) +1: Up to X target Beebles can't be blocked this turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand. −1: Draw a card.

card.name: Carnivorous Death-Parrot
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Carnivorous Death-Parrot unless you say its flavor text.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Save a kill spell to deal with this guy.

card.name: Cheatyface
card.property: If Cheatyface is in your hand, you may sneak Cheatyface onto the battlefield. If an opponent catches you right away, that player may exile Cheatyface. Flying

card.name: Chicken à la King
card.property: Whenever a 6 is rolled on a six-sided die, put a +1/+1 counter on each Bird. (You may roll dice only when instructed to.) Tap an untapped Bird you control: Roll a six-sided die. (Like now.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the Chicken Revolution, the king managed to keep his head while the others—well, just ran around.

card.name: Common Courtesy
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell without asking your permission while casting it, counter that spell. When a player asks you permission to cast a spell and you refuse, counter that spell and sacrifice Common Courtesy.

card.name: Johnny, Combo Player
card.property: {4}: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just wait till I get my Krark-Clan Ironworks, Genesis Chamber, and Grinding Station. Oh yeah, and a second Myr Retriever."

card.name: Magic Word
card.property: Enchant creature As Magic Word enters the battlefield, choose a word. Whisper the chosen word: Tap enchanted creature.

card.name: Mer Man
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.

card.name: Richard Garfield, Ph.D.
card.property: You may play cards as though they were other cards of your choice with the same mana cost. You can't choose the same card twice. (Mana cost includes color.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And yea he doth spake: "Let there be Magic."

card.name: Rings a Bell
card.property: As Rings a Bell enters the battlefield, choose a word with four or more letters. After you say the chosen word for the first time each turn, an opponent may ring or imitate a bell within five seconds. When no opponent does, draw a card.

card.name: Time Out
card.property: Roll a six-sided die. Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library, where X is the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anyone other than a goblin would've gotten only a hand caught in the cookie jar.

card.name: Topsy Turvy
card.property: The phases of each player's turn are reversed. (The phases are, in reverse order, ending, postcombat main, combat, precombat main, and beginning.) As long as there are more than two players in the game, the turn order is reversed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here on going is heck the what?"

card.name: Wall of Fortune
card.property: Defender You may tap an untapped Wall you control to have any player reroll a die that player rolled.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You need a six? All right everyone, she needs a six!"

card.name: Acornelia, Fashionable Filcher
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell with a squirrel in its art, you get {A} (an acorn counter). Whenever a Squirrel you control enters the battlefield or dies, you get {A}. {2}{B}, Pay X {A}: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. {G}, Pay X {A}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Bat-
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn, Augment {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Booster Tutor
card.property: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of those cards into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You saved that Urza's Saga pack all these years for this?"

card.name: Dirty Rat
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Duh
card.property: Destroy target creature with reminder text. (Reminder text is any italicized text in parentheses that explains rules you already know.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Will players understand that the creature is being crushed by two parentheses? Not a chance.

card.name: Enter the Dungeon
card.property: Players play a Magic subgame under the table, starting at 5 life and using their libraries as their decks. The winner searches their library for two cards, puts those cards into their hand, then shuffles their library.

card.name: Hoisted Hireling
card.property: Hoisted Hireling has flying as long as it's being held above the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zarv no longer trusted the kitten posters telling him to "hang in there."

card.name: Infernal Spawn of Evil
card.property: Flying, first strike {1}{B}, Reveal Infernal Spawn of Evil from your hand, Say "It's coming": Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.

card.name: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil
card.property: Flying, first strike, trample Once each turn, while you're searching your library, you may pay {1}{B}, reveal Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil from your library and say "I'm coming, too" If you do, Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 2 damage to a player of your choice.

card.name: Infernius Spawnington III, Esq.
card.property: Flying, first strike, trample, haste This spell costs {3} less to cast for each card you've revealed this turn. When Infernius Spawnington III, Esq. enters the battlefield, you may say "I'm here." If you do, it deals 3 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: See evil, hear evil, speak evil.

card.name: Inhumaniac
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die. On a 3 or 4, put a +1/+1 counter on Inhumaniac. On a 5 or higher, put two +1/+1 counters on it. On a 1, remove all +1/+1 counters from Inhumaniac.

card.name: Jumbo Imp
card.property: Flying As Jumbo Imp enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Jumbo Imp enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the result. At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die and put a number of +1/+1 counters on Jumbo Imp equal to the result. At the beginning of your end step, roll a six-sided die and remove a number of +1/+1 counters from Jumbo Imp equal to the result.

card.name: Poultrygeist
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature dies, you may roll a six-sided die. If you roll a 1, sacrifice Poultrygeist. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on Poultrygeist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farmer Brown never ate eggs again.

card.name: Skull Saucer
card.property: Flying When Skull Saucer enters the battlefield, destroy target creature and put your head on the table. Sacrifice Skull Saucer when your head stops touching the table.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No body is ready for this kind of power.

card.name: Snickering Squirrel
card.property: You may tap Snickering Squirrel to increase the result of a die any player rolled by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In this line of work, you've got to know how to squirrel things away. Quite literally, in my case."

card.name: Stinging Scorpion
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Abstract Iguanart
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, note the first letter of its artist's name. If that letter wasn't already noted, put a +1/+1 counter on Abstract Iguanart.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Another moving piece by the artist El Gecko.

card.name: Blast from the Past
card.property: Madness {R}, cycling {1}{R}, kicker {2}{R}, flashback {3}{R}, buyback {4}{R} Blast from the Past deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

card.name: Boomstacker
card.property: As Boomstacker enters the battlefield and whenever it attacks, stack two dice on top of it. (All dice must be stacked vertically, one on top of another.) Boomstacker gets +1/+1 for each die in its stack. Boomstacker attacks each combat if able. When the stack falls, sacrifice Boomstacker.

card.name: Common Iguana
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Goblin Haberdasher
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Other creatures you control wearing hats in their art have menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An accessory in every sense of the word.

card.name: Goblin S.W.A.T. Team
card.property: Say "Goblin S.W.A.T. Team": Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin S.W.A.T. Team unless an opponent swats the table within five seconds. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They refer to their methods as "special S.W.A.T. tactics," and no one has lived to correct them.

card.name: Goblin Tutor
card.property: Roll a six-sided die. If you roll a 1, Goblin Tutor has no effect. Otherwise, search your library for the indicated card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. 2 — A card named Goblin Tutor 3 — An enchantment card 4 — An artifact card 5 — A creature card 6 — An instant or sorcery card

card.name: Infinity Elemental
card.property: (This creature has INFINITE POWER.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says,

card.name: Painiac
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die. Painiac gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're about to be struck by a brilliant idea!"

card.name: Six-y Beast
card.property: As Six-y Beast enters the battlefield, you secretly put six or fewer +1/+1 counters on it, then an opponent guesses the number of counters. If that player guesses right, sacrifice Six-y Beast after it enters the battlefield.

card.name: Stet, Draconic Proofreader
card.property: Flying Whenever Stet, Draconic Proofreader attacks, you may exile a card from your graveyard. When you do, Stet, Draconic Proofreader deals 4 damage to any target whose name begins with the same letter as the exiled card. {W}: Delete the first letter of target permanent or player's name until end of turn.

card.name: Strategy, Schmategy
card.property: Roll a six-sided die. Strategy, Schmategy has the indicated effect. 1 — Do nothing. 2 — Destroy all artifacts. 3 — Destroy all lands. 4 — Strategy, Schmategy deals 3 damage to each creature and each player. 5 — Each player discards their hand and draws seven cards. 6 — Repeat this process two more times.

card.name: Super-Duper Death Ray
card.property: Trample (This spell can deal excess damage to its target's controller.) Super-Duper Death Ray deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Yet Another Aether Vortex
card.property: All creatures have haste. Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. Noninstant, nonsorcery cards on top of a library are on the battlefield under their owner's control in addition to being in that library.

card.name: B-I-N-G-O
card.property: Trample Whenever a player casts a spell, put a chip counter on its converted mana cost. B-I-N-G-O gets +9/+9 for each set of three numbers in a row with chip counters on them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was a farmer, had a hound . . .

card.name: Elvish Impersonators
card.property: As Elvish Impersonators enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die twice. Its base power becomes the first result and its base toughness becomes the second result.

card.name: Free-Range Chicken
card.property: {1} {G}: Roll two six-sided dice. If both results are the same, Free-Range Chicken gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that result. If the total of those results is equal to any other total you have rolled this turn for this ability, sacrifice it. (For example, if you roll two 3s, it gets +3/+3. If you roll a 4 and a 2 for this ability later that turn, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Growth Spurt
card.property: Roll a six-sided die. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: MORE TO LOVE: Friendly, nature-loving, Bunyonesque SEM seeks SEF looking for a huge commitment. . . . seeks atog prince

card.name: Half-Squirrel, Half-
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, Augment {G} ({G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mother Kangaroo
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on this creature equal to the result.

card.name: Old Fogey
card.property: Phasing, cumulative upkeep {1}, echo {G}{G}, fading 3, bands with other Dinosaurs, protection from Homarids, snow-covered plainswalk, flanking, rampage 2

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These kids today with their collector numbers and their newfangled tap symbol. Twenty Black Lotuses and twenty Plague Rats. Now that's real Magic."

card.name: Pippa, Duchess of Dice

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it came to following her orders, it was do and die.

card.name: Slaying Mantis
card.property: Just a second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't move cards on the battlefield.) Slaying Mantis enters the battlefield by being thrown from a distance of at least three feet. When Slaying Mantis enters the battlefield, it fights each creature an opponent controls that it touched as it entered.

card.name: Spirit of the Season
card.property: When Spirit of the Season enters the battlefield, it gains haste if it's summer. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if it's autumn. You gain 5 life if it's winter. If it's spring, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Summoned for all the wrong seasons.

card.name: Squirrel Farm
card.property: {1} {G}: Reveal a card in your hand, covering the artist credit. Target opponent guesses the artist. If they guess wrong, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And the ignorant shall fall to the squirrels." —Chip 2:54

card.name: Surgeon General Commander
card.property: Whenever you augment, enchant, or mutate a creature you control, draw a card. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Likes: augmentation, fluffy animals, creative templating.

card.name: Timmy, Power Gamer
card.property: {4}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just wait till I get my Gigantosaurus...."

card.name: Wild Crocodile
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Who // What // When // Where // Why
Bronze Calendar
card.property: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. You must speak in a voice other than your normal voice. When you speak in your normal voice, sacrifice Bronze Calendar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every page holds a month, every date a numeral.

card.name: Entirely Normal Armchair
card.property: During your turn, if Entirely Normal Armchair is in your hand, you may hide it on the battlefield. {0}: Return Entirely Normal Armchair to its owner's hand. Only any opponent may activate this ability and only if they see Entirely Normal Armchair. {2}, Sacrifice Entirely Normal Armchair: Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Jack-in-the-Mox
card.property: {T}: Roll a six-sided die. This ability has the indicated effect. 1 — Sacrifice Jack-in-the-Mox and you lose 5 life. 2 — Add {W}. 3 — Add {U}. 4 — Add {B}. 5 — Add {R}. 6 — Add {G}.

card.name: Krark's Other Thumb
card.property: If you would roll a die, instead roll two of those dice and ignore one of those results.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Krark was the kind of goblin who'd lose his thumb in a wager and come right back with "Double or nothing!"

card.name: Paper Tiger
card.property: Creatures named Rock Lobster can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tiger is always quick to fold.

card.name: Pointy Finger of Doom
card.property: {3}, {T}: Spin Pointy Finger of Doom in the middle of the table so that it rotates completely at least once, then destroy the closest permanent the finger points to.

card.name: Rock Lobster
card.property: Creatures named Scissors Lizard can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many take the lobster for granite.

card.name: Scissors Lizard
card.property: Creatures named Paper Tiger can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing beats the lizard's shear power.

card.name: Sword of Dungeons & Dragons
Water Gun Balloon Game
card.property: As Water Gun Balloon Game enters the battlefield, each player puts a pop counter on a 0. Whenever a player casts a spell, move that player's pop counter up 1. Whenever a player's pop counter hits 5, that player creates a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token and resets all pop counters to 0.

card.name: Underdome
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to pay silver-bordered costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In that battleground of a ring, the rules aren't nearly so black and white.
